Posts.Content: blanca6500 wrote: I have an aappointment tomorrow because I am concerned about this rash I developed on my right breast I've had it for about a week, it hasn't gotten any bigger but antibiotic ointments have not cleared it. My question is if it resembles anyones early stages with IBC. I am not experiencing any other symptoms associated with IBC, but I am extremely worried. Please help!  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: is this Inflammatory breast cancer? blanca6500 marie5890

Posts.Content: Feb 15, 2014 06:58AM blanca6500 wrote: Thank you for being concerned I just got out of the Dr. and she looked at my breast, performed a breast exam and said that it did not look like IBC. I have a check up in a month just for precautionary measures, but she did advice me that if the rash grows or gets worse to not wait until the check up and go in sooner. I am hoping it goes away soon and I do feel much better now that I got a professional to examine the rash. Thank you both, I will keep you updated.
Posts.Title: is this Inflammatory breast cancer? blanca6500 marie5890
